name: d3-pathLayout
description: d3.js plugin that maps the coordinates of an array of nodes, to points on a given SVG path string.

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-pathLayout.js -- index.js
scripts.uglify: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-pathLayout.js -c -m -o build/d3-pathLayout.min.js
scripts.zip: npm run uglify && zip -j build/d3-pathLayout.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-pathLayout.js build/d3-pathLayout.min.js
